name: Lia's Adventure
description:
Lia is a happy store owner that aid people during Christmas to bring joy and happiness to their families. But a terrible hurricane passed through the great Sabará city in the night before Christmas eve, all the bags of gifts bought by Lia flew, spreading them all over the city.  Without it, Lia cannot sell her products and the Christmas is at risk!

Help her to recover all the bags so she can be able to sell gifts and save Christmas!

Status: Work In Progress

Version: 0.0.1

Release date: 8th March, 2021
